body:
![Quick and painless exam schedule search engine](http://doubleudesigns.com/misc/whenismyexam-teaser.png)

# Welcome to When is my Exam!?
IoBM exam timetables made easy. Quick, painless search. Just enter your course code and instantly find out when your exam is! Enables you to easily share your course schedules with friends. Do you cower at the sight of those huge PDF files each time the hourlies or finals roll by? Well, this app is the answer to your prayers.

## Support
If you're a user and are having some problems, you can find tech support [tech support here](https://www.facebook.com/pages/When-is-my-Exam/379088085464698?ref=hl) or [here](https://facebook.com/doubleudesigns).

### Contact
If you're interested in collaboration or want a peek at the source code, get in touch at waleed@doubleudesigns.com
tagline: The IoBM exam schedule search engine, deployed as a Facebook app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: When is my Exam!?
